reporter_caption.center: APPEALS DISPOSED OF WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION OR MEMORANDUM (Vt. 1999)

opinion.opinion_text:
SUPREME COURT OF VERMONT The Supreme Court of Vermont, commencing with decisions filed in 1991, compiles and publishes a table, on a monthly basis, listing the disposition of all appeals on the merits.
DOCKET DECISION TITLE NUMBER DATE DISPOSITION TRIAL FORUM

Shea ......................... 99-185 12/30/1999 Stay denied Wash. Dist. Page 176
